channel.title: Comments on: Episode 11 – Call Me (Internationally), Maybe?
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Joel
item.dc:creator: Joel
item.description: For spam text messages: if you use an Android phone, you can install avast! mobile security which features, along with many great features, a spam text message blocker/filter. It will actually ask you if you want to block any text messages received from unknown numbers.
item.content:encoded: For spam text messages: if you use an Android phone, you can install avast! mobile security which features, along with many great features, a spam text message blocker/filter. It will actually ask you if you want to block any text messages received from unknown numbers.
